page.title: 04INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: The school had a bell tower used for calling people to school and it was rung again at 12:50 to tell people it was lunch time.The school had exactly the same classes and the partition separating Mrs Mayor's class from Mrs Storer's used to move .The only time they moved the partition was to make room for a stage when they performed plays. In Cotgrave the post office used to be divided in two and the left part was a bake house where people used to bake their bread and it would cost them half a penny. The bake house was owned by Mrs Upton and it was closed down during the First World War,but even today the bake house is still there. Outside our school just across the road were stocks that people who were bad got locked in.
